description: name of the File Request feature used to translate when a File Request is uploaded by the service
Message to display when no versions are available
defaultMessage: No prior versions are available for this file.

description: Header to display for group of versions created in the prior week
Header to display for group of versions created in the current month
Header to display for group of versions created yesterday
Header to display for group of versions created today
Title for the preview versions sidebar
Label for the current version item in the version history list.
Label for the version delete action.
Error message for the version delete action.
defaultMessage: File version could not be deleted.

description: Tooltip message for actions disabled by retention policy.
Label for the version download action.
Error message for the version download action.
defaultMessage: File version could not be downloaded.

description: Label for the version preview action.
Label for the version promote action.
Error message for the version promote action.
defaultMessage: File version could not be made current.

description: Label for the version restore action.
Error message for the version restored action.
defaultMessage: File version could not be restored.

description: Label for the version actions dropdown menu toggle button.
Message displayed for a deleted version. {name} is the user who performed the action.
Error message for the versions fetch call.
defaultMessage: File versions could not be retrieved.

description: Error message with upsell for the versions fetch call for users who dont have the version feature.
defaultMessage: Sorry, version history is not available with your current account plan. To access versioning, select from one of our paid plans.

description: Text displayed if a version exceeds the user's maximum allowed version count
defaultMessage: You are limited to the last {versionLimit, number} {versionLimit, plural, one {version} other {versions}}.

description: Text to display in the version badge.
Label given to the version badge for screen readers.
Message displayed for a restored version. {name} is the user who performed the action.
Message displayed for a restored version. {name} is the user who performed the action.
Heading for inline error messages displayed due to a remote server issue.
Text on the upgrade button shown when user does not have access to Version History
Message displayed for an uploaded version. {name} is the user who performed the action.
Name displayed for unknown or deleted users.
Max supported entries for version history
defaultMessage: Version history is limited to the last {maxVersions} entries.

description: Message describing when the version will be deleted due to an applied retention policy.
defaultMessage: Will be deleted {time} by retention policy.

description: Message describing that the version retention policy is indefinite and will not expire.
Message describing when the version retention policy will expire.
Upgrade message shown when user does not have access to Version History
defaultMessage: Sorry, version history is not available with your current account plan. To access versioning, select from one of our paid plans.

description: Text on the upgrade button shown when user does not have access to Version History
